posts.post_content:
Have some cards in looking to sell or trade. Would be willing to trade for EPDGs I don't have.

If buying, would like payment to be PPF&F. All prices include shipping with tracking.

I'm also willing to listen to offers but anyone saying "I'll take it" gets priority over any negotiations.

I've combined scans as appropriate so coloring of the slabs is inconsistent.....plus my scanner doesn't like SGC slabs. 

$90 Dan Moeller SGC 60
$SOLD Larry Schlafly SGC 60
$90 Art Fletcher SGC 60
$95 Charlie Rhodes SGC 60
$32 Gus Dorner SGC 40
$SOLD Dode Paskert PSA 3
